body: works fine here. please post a full bug report as described here: https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/contributing.md

well, it obviously doesn't work here, otherwise i wouldn't have filed the bug report.

the log contains the following:

warning 	php 	invalid argument supplied for foreach() at /www/htdocs/w00d7ed1/owncloud5/apps/files_trashbin/ajax/undelete.php#14 

can you give more explicit instructions what information you need and how i can help debug this? the template you posted is pretty generic.

and please, don't just close bug reports, ask for more information if you need them.
closing them offhand sucks.
